overall.description: An array with ones at and below the given diagonal and zeros elsewhere.

N.description: Number of rows in the array.

M.description: Number of columns in the array. By default, M is taken equal to N.

k.description: The sub-diagonal at and below which the array is filled. k = 0 is the main diagonal, while k < 0 is below it, and k > 0 is above.  The default is 0.

dtype.description: Data type of the returned array.  The default is float.

tri.description: Array with its lower triangle filled with ones and zero elsewhere; in other words T[i,j] == 1 for j <= i + k, 0 otherwise.
